title: ldap sub groups
body:
introduce new ldap share with subgroups possibility.
in a common scenario i wanna have some users (top level users like
employees) who can share with users some levels beyond them.

f.e.

we have employees, teachers and students.
the employees want to be able to share with teachers and students but
the teachers and student should not be able to share with the employess.

the possibilities wich are given now, a setting to share with everyone
and a setting to only share with members of the same group are not what
we needed.

we needed a possibility to create a ldap (msad) structure with groups,
wich contain other groups as members. so we can create a hierarchical
group structure.

owncloud wasn't ready yet to handle such a structure. so we implemented
it.
we would appreciat, if you could review it, and if you can needed it
implement it in the main branch.

if something isn't like you guys want it, please let me know.
i would love to make all changes like you wanna have it.

also i recognized, that the commit messages aren't that cool. it's like this text. but on every change i left some comments in the code.
i'm sorry but it's the first time i'm using github. the tfs from ms was my preferred source-management system till this point of time.
please report me if i should change something.

if you review it and think, yeah maybe that could be usefull, let me know, so i can signe your contributing agreement. if you won't use it for sure, i don't have to signe it anyways.

greets
